title: First PHL offshore wind project cleared for green lane treatment - BusinessWorld Online
summary: The Board of Investments endorses the Philippines' first offshore wind project by Ivisan Windkraft Corp. for green lane services, aiming to expedite permits and licenses. The 450-megawatt Frontera Bay Wind Power Project off Cavite aligns with the country's clean energy and offshore wind industry goals, showing potential for job creation and community development.
green_innovation: TRUE. This project represents green innovation as it aligns with environmental sustainability goals by promoting clean energy production through offshore wind power.
